actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that the counties of Audrain and Montgomery shall be in the Northern Division of the Eastern Judicial District of Missouri.

summary.text: Transfers the counties of Audrain and Montgomery from the Eastern Division of the Eastern Judicial District of Missouri to the Northern Division of such District.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide that the counties of Audrain and Montgomery shall be in the Northern Division of the Eastern Judicial District of Missouri.
